title: Vox Machina Ep. 8 - Glass and Bone
description: With two party members turned to stone and another taken captive by the Duergar Queen, the remaining members of Vox Machina struggle to survive. Low on health and options, they flee Emberhold and recoup their losses. But the group hasn't given up, and continue to push through the Underdark, guided by their Ranger Vex'ahlia, finding themselves on track to Pike's mysterious vision...
